pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/dycw-utilities.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/dycw-utilities)# `dycw-utilities`[All the Python functions I don't want to write twice.](https://github.com/nvim-lua/plenary.nvim)## Installation- `pip install dycw-utilities`or with [extras](https://github.com/dycw/python-utilities/blob/master/pyproject.toml).
